document_data.name: Cape of the Red Prince
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cape of the Red Prince''' was a mundane cloak that could be found in the [[Western Heartlands]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The cape was made from a rich fabric that was dyed red and featured [[gold]]-colored embroidery of two [[dragon]]s, flanking either side of a broad [[scimitar]].
document_data.History:
The cape presumably belonged to or was associated with the "Red Prince", an enigmatic reptilian [[humanoid]] that was depicted wearing [[plate mail]] armor and wielding a scimitar.

As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a [[Portrait of the Red Prince|portrait]] of the Red Prince could be found within the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn.
